channel.title: Rsps downtime?
channel.description: dont really know where else to post this, but my rsps is 24-7 its called gravityscape.. yesterday my server was online all day, then i went to check the votes and it said it was offline? i restarted my server then about 10 mins later it said it was online again, so i was like ok ill let it build up over time in about a week it will be high 90s, so i go to check today and it did it again? went from 93-90... its agrivating because im trying hard to get players and when its down a few pages its hard when it has been 24-7 but i guess it glitched and dropped its uptime... is there any way a mod or some thing can fix it? heres the link to my status page.. i would really like this getting looked into http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=317scape.no-ip.biz

item.title: Rsps downtime?
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

[quote=“heatrn11, post:5, topic:451310”]I need to help someone.[/quote]Understand, The only person who can reset server status uptime is mitb and he wont for any reason. you going to have to deal with it.

Read full topic

item.title: Rsps downtime?
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

I need to help someone.

Read full topic

item.title: Rsps downtime?
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

There is no such thing as ‘100% uptime forever’.

Read full topic

item.title: Rsps downtime?
item.dc:creator: @Gravity_pk Gravity pk
item.description:
@Gravity_pk wrote:

its 40% im aware but its not my fault though is the point, ive let it drop below because it wasn’t 24-7 till yesterday and i wanted to keep 100% uptime forever, but it glitched out which wasn’t my fault though which is my reason

Read full topic

item.title: Rsps downtime?
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

No the only way to get you’re server uptime up is too let it fall the below 60% (or whatever the value is) and wait for it to get deleted so you can re-list it. Or you could wait for it to round back up to 99.9 which would take exceptionally longer.

Read full topic

item.title: Rsps downtime?
item.dc:creator: @Gravity_pk Gravity pk
item.description:
@Gravity_pk wrote:

dont really know where else to post this, but my rsps is 24-7 its called gravityscape… yesterday my server was online all day, then i went to check the votes and it said it was offline? i restarted my server then about 10 mins later it said it was online again, so i was like ok ill let it build up over time in about a week it will be high 90s, so i go to check today and it did it again? went from 93-90… its agrivating because im trying hard to get players and when its down a few pages its hard when it has been 24-7 but i guess it glitched and dropped its uptime… is there any way a mod or some thing can fix it? heres the link to my status page… i would really like this getting looked into http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=317scape.no-ip.biz
